msg: No ascii armor parameter is used in the call to verifier.verifyDetachedSignature().

msg: Work around a strange behavior in maven-dependency-plugin.

msg: Don't use the same variable for a local variable and a global variable

author: dennisl
msg: If the secret keyring does not contain the specified key an OpenPgpException is thrown indicating what the problem is. The previous behavior was that an NPE was thrown but not handled.

author: dennisl
msg: Include the name of the file in the exception message if the public or secret keyring file does not exist or is not readable.
